Plot: Charlie St. Cloud is a young man overcome by grief at the death of his younger 
brother. So much so that he takes a job as caretaker of the cemetery in which his
brother is buried. Charlie has a special lasting bond with his brother though, as he 
can see him. Charlie meets up with his brother (Sam) each night to play catch and talk.
